items.sentence: We\'ll have a lot more fun if Tom comes, too.
Tom is smarter than you probably think he is.
I don\'t feel like eating Chinese food today.
I don\'t know any of those people over there.
Tom won\'t be here today, because he\'s sick.
Tom found out that his phone had been bugged.
Tom found what he was looking for in his car.
Tom gave a French-English dictionary to Mary.
Tom is doing his best to stay out of trouble.
One man\'s medicine is another man\'s poison.
Tom didn\'t know Mary wanted to go yesterday.
Tom didn\'t know a single person in the room.
Tom didn\'t know how bad I wanted to see him.
Tom is the most talented artist in our class.
Everyone here knows that Tom is in Australia.
We need to remember what happened here today.
We never seem to have anything to talk about.
The doctor painted Tom\'s throat with iodine.
It looks like Tom is really enjoying himself.
I need to know what happened at school today.
